narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bureau of Public Health Laboratories is a Clinical Medical Laboratory provider based in Jacksonville, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $81.7M in Medicaid payments across 9.1M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $81.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
